root.name: A Tale of Two Kingdoms
root.description: StoryThe ancient kingdom of Theylinn is beset by enemies. Within the castle walls, nobles vie for the old King's favor, and not everybody is happy with the sole heir to the throne, princess Rhiannon.Meanwhile, danger approaches, in the form of an invading army, a hostile giant, and a mercenary troop who are ancient enemies of the Theylann king.FeaturesFive different endings; many sidequests and alternative solutions; teamwork with non-player characters; 75 minutes of high quality music; and director's commentary.
